records.text: I have an idea for a book in three movements. I have a character with three post-nominals, and each act of the book would be the story behind how he got each of those names. I have some thoughts in my head about the general stories of each of them. The problem, here, though, is that I don't write and I rarely (if ever) read books. Where do I start? #literature#author?#Bookwriting#books#writing

records.text: Facebook has become like that neighborhood bar you hang out atcwith friends. It used to be good but the drinks are now getting more expensive and they recently replaced the excellent jukebox with a DJ that keeps talking over the music.You don't want to leave because your friends still hang out, but it annoys you evertly time you go.This is the business risk for Meta - someday you will convince your buds to go elsewhere or realize that it's not that hard to build a home bar.
